actions.code: const checkbox = document.getElementById('form-field-termsAndConditions'); const label = document.querySelector('#app > div > div > div > div > div.inScreen > div > div > div > div > div.inScreen > div > div > div > div > div.inScreen > div > div > div > div.wrapper > div > div.subtitle.left > div.checkboxes > div > label'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = true; checkbox.setAttribute('checked', 'checked'); } if (label) { label.setAttribute('aria-checked', 'true'); } const event = new Event('change', {bubbles: true, cancelable: true}); checkbox.dispatchEvent(event); const formInput = checkbox.closest('.FormInputCheckCmp'); if (formInput && formInput.__vue__) { try { formInput.__vue__.$emit('change', true); formInput.__vue__.$emit('input', true); } catch(e) {} }
